To get the description from the transaction calldata, you just need to decode the calldata. 

For example, in ZIP4, the proposal transaction is [here](https://explorer.zksync.io/tx/0x5e7ef52948f372de0a64c19e76a30313f2b6b1e4b4b63791eb0fcac68a565604). And you can see the calldata as the "input data". Just copy paste that into case, and run a command like so:

```
cast calldata-decode "propose(address[],uint256[],bytes[],string)" 
```

And this will output the description, as well as all the other parameters.
